verses.verse: Jude, <S%G2455><s%> the <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G2385>James,<s%> to them that are <S%G37>sanctified<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5083>preserved<s%> in <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> and <S%G2822>called.<s%>
Mercy <S%G1656><s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G26>love,<s%> be <S%G4129>multiplied.<s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> when I <S%G4160>gave<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4710>diligence<s%> to <S%G1125>write<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2839>common<s%> <S%G4991>salvation,<s%> it was <S%G2192>needful<s%> <S%G318><s%> for me to <S%G1125>write<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> and <S%G3870>exhort<s%> you that ye should earnestly contend <S%G1864>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> which was <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G40>saints.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> there are <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> crept in <S%G3921>unawares,<s%> who were before of old <S%G4270>ordained<s%> <S%G3819><s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2917>condemnation,<s%> ungodly <S%G765>men,<s%> <S%G3346>turning<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G766>lasciviousness,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G720>denying<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G1203>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

I <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1014>will<s%> therefore put you in <S%G5279>remembrance,<s%> <S%G5209><s%> though <S%G5209>ye<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G1492>knew<s%> <S%G5124>this,<s%> how <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> having <S%G4982>saved<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1093>land<s%> of <S%G125>Egypt,<s%> <S%G1208>afterward<s%> <S%G622>destroyed<s%> them that <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G3361>not.<s%>

And <S%G5037><s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> which <S%G5083>kept<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1438>their<s%> first <S%G746>estate,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G620>left<s%> their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3613>habitation,<s%> he hath <S%G5083>reserved<s%> in <S%G126>everlasting<s%> <S%G1199>chains<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G2217>darkness<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G2920>judgment<s%> of the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2250>day.<s%>

Even <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1116>Gomorrah,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4172>cities<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> in like <S%G3664>manner,<s%> <S%G5158><s%> giving themselves over to <S%G1608>fornication,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G565>going<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G2087>strange<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> are set <S%G4295>forth<s%> for an <S%G1164>example,<s%> <S%G5254>suffering<s%> the <S%G1349>vengeance<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G4442>fire.<s%>

Likewise <S%G3668><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> filthy <S%G1797>dreamers<s%> <S%G3392>defile<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G114>despise<s%> <S%G2963>dominion,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> speak evil <S%G987>of<s%> <S%G1391>dignities.<s%>

Yet <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3413>Michael<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G743>archangel,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> <S%G1252>contending<s%> with <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1228>devil<s%> he <S%G1256>disputed<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G5111>durst<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> bring <S%G2018>against<s%> him a <S%G988>railing<s%> <S%G2920>accusation,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2036>said,<s%> The <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> <S%G4671>thee.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> speak evil <S%G987>of<s%> those <S%G3745>things<s%> which <S%G3303>they<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3756>not:<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3745>what<s%> they <S%G1987>know<s%> <S%G5447>naturally,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G249>brute<s%> <S%G2226>beasts,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> those <S%G5125>things<s%> they corrupt <S%G5351>themselves.<s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> unto <S%G846>them!<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> they have <S%G4198>gone<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2535>Cain,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> ran greedily <S%G1632>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4106>error<s%> of <S%G903>Balaam<s%> for <S%G3408>reward,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G622>perished<s%> in <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G485>gainsaying<s%> of <S%G2879>Korah.<s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G4694>spots<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> feasts of <S%G26>charity,<s%> when they feast <S%G4910>with<s%> <S%G5213>you,<s%> <S%G4165>feeding<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%> without <S%G870>fear:<s%> <S%G3507>clouds<s%> they are without <S%G504>water,<s%> carried <S%G4064>about<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G417>winds;<s%> <S%G1186>trees<s%> whose fruit <S%G5352>withereth,<s%> without <S%G175>fruit,<s%> <S%G1364>twice<s%> <S%G599>dead,<s%> plucked up by the <S%G1610>roots;<s%>

Raging <S%G66><s%> <S%G2949>waves<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> foaming <S%G1890>out<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G152>shame;<s%> <S%G4107>wandering<s%> <S%G792>stars,<s%> to <S%G3739>whom<s%> is <S%G5083>reserved<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2217>blackness<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%> <S%G1519>forever.<s%> <S%G165><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1802>Enoch<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> the <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G76>Adam,<s%> <S%G4395>prophesied<s%> of <S%G5125>these,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2400>Behold,<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> ten <S%G3461>thousands<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G40>saints,<s%>

To <S%G4160>execute<s%> <S%G2920>judgment<s%> <S%G2596>upon<s%> <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G1827>convince<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that are <S%G765>ungodly<s%> among <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G763>ungodly<s%> <S%G2041>deeds<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> they have ungodly <S%G764>committed,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> their <S%G4642>hard<s%> speeches <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G765>ungodly<s%> <S%G268>sinners<s%> have <S%G2980>spoken<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G1113>murmurers,<s%> <S%G3202>complainers,<s%> <S%G4198>walking<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> their <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G1939>lusts;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G848>their<s%> <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2980>speaketh<s%> great <S%G5246>swelling<s%> words, having men's persons in <S%G2296>admiration<s%> <S%G4383><s%> because <S%G5484>of<s%> <S%G5622>advantage.<s%>

But, <S%G1161><s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> <S%G3415>remember<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4487>words<s%> which were spoken <S%G4280>before<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

How <S%G3754>that<s%> they <S%G3004>told<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> there <S%G3754>should<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1703>mockers<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2078>last<s%> <S%G5550>time,<s%> who should <S%G4198>walk<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> their <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G763>ungodly<s%> <S%G1939>lusts.<s%>
These <S%G3778><s%> <S%G1526>be<s%> they who <S%G592>separate<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G5591>sensual,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5210>ye,<s%> <S%G27>beloved,<s%> building <S%G2026>up<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> on <S%G5216>your<s%> most <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G4336>praying<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost,<s%>

Keep <S%G5083><s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> looking <S%G4327>for<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G2222>life.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> of <S%G3739>some<s%> <S%G3303><s%> have <S%G1653>compassion,<s%> making a difference: <S%G1252><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3739>others<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G5401>fear,<s%> <S%G726>pulling<s%> them out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4442>fire;<s%> <S%G3404>hating<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5509>garment<s%> <S%G4696>spotted<s%> <S%G575>by<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> unto him that is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G5442>keep<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> from <S%G679>falling,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> to <S%G2476>present<s%> you <S%G299>faultless<s%> before the <S%G2714>presence<s%> of <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> exceeding <S%G20>joy,<s%>

To the <S%G3441>only<s%> <S%G4680>wise<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4990>Savior,<s%> be <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3172>majesty,<s%> <S%G2904>dominion<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1849>power,<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>ever.<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
